Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 28th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1970...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Oakland on 2/13/1970 (Going to OAK: P D. Demola. Going to CHW: 2B F. White)...

Earned first career win on 6/18/1975...
